etag.Description: HTTP strong entity tag value. Ignored if submitted

kind.Description: The resource kind. Only 'vm' (the default) is supported.

properties.Description: Properties of the Data Migration service instance

provisioningState.Description: The resource's provisioning state. Possible values include: 'Accepted', 'Deleting', 'Deploying', 'Stopped', 'Stopping', 'Starting', 'FailedToStart', 'FailedToStop', 'Succeeded', 'Failed'

publicKey.Description: The public key of the service, used to encrypt secrets sent to the service

virtualSubnetId.Description: The ID of the Microsoft.Network/virtualNetworks/subnets resource to which the service should be joined

name.Description: The unique name of the SKU, such as 'P3'

tier.Description: The tier of the SKU, such as 'Free', 'Basic', 'Standard', or 'Premium'

family.Description: The SKU family, used when the service has multiple performance classes within a tier, such as 'A', 'D', etc. for virtual machines

size.Description: The size of the SKU, used when the name alone does not denote a service size or when a SKU has multiple performance classes within a family, e.g. 'A1' for virtual machines

capacity.Description: The capacity of the SKU, if it supports scaling

etag.Description: HTTP strong entity tag value. This is ignored if submitted.

properties.Description: Base class for all types of DMS task properties. If task is not supported by current client, this object is returned.

errors.Description: Array of errors. This is ignored if submitted.

state.Description: The state of the task. This is ignored if submitted. Possible values include: 'Unknown', 'Queued', 'Running', 'Canceled', 'Succeeded', 'Failed', 'FailedInputValidation', 'Faulted'

code.Description: The machine-readable description of the error, such as 'InvalidRequest' or 'InternalServerError'

message.Description: The human-readable description of the error

details.Description: Inner errors that caused this error

input.Description: Input for the task that validates connection to SQL Server and also validates source server requirements

output.Description: Task output. This is ignored if submitted.

taskType.Description: Properties for the task that validates connection to SQL Server and also validates source server requirements

sourceConnectionInfo.Description: Information for connecting to SQL database server

checkPermissionsGroup.Description: Permission group for validations. Possible values include: 'Default', 'MigrationFromSqlServerToAzureDB'

CollectLogins.Description: Flag for whether to collect logins from source server.

CollectAgentJobs.Description: Flag for whether to collect agent jobs from source server.

authentication.Description: Authentication type to use for connection. Possible values include: 'None', 'WindowsAuthentication', 'SqlAuthentication', 'ActiveDirectoryIntegrated', 'ActiveDirectoryPassword'

trustServerCertificate.Description: Whether to trust the server certificate

type.Description: Information for connecting to SQL database server

databases.Description: Source databases as a map from database name to database id

Logins.Description: Source logins as a map from login name to login id.

AgentJobs.Description: Source agent jobs as a map from agent job name to id.

resultType.Description: Task level output for the task that validates connection to SQL Server and also validates source server requirements

filePath.Description: The path to the file where exception occurred

lineNumber.Description: The line number where exception occurred

hResult.Description: Coded numerical value that is assigned to a specific exception

sizeMB.Description: Size of the file in megabytes

compatibilityLevel.Description: SQL Server compatibility level of database. Possible values include: 'CompatLevel80', 'CompatLevel90', 'CompatLevel100', 'CompatLevel110', 'CompatLevel120', 'CompatLevel130', 'CompatLevel140'

databaseState.Description: State of the database. Possible values include: 'Online', 'Restoring', 'Recovering', 'RecoveryPending', 'Suspect', 'Emergency', 'Offline', 'Copying', 'OfflineSecondary'

physicalFullName.Description: Operating-system full path of the file

restoreFullName.Description: Suggested full path of the file for restoring

fileType.Description: Database file type. Possible values include: 'Rows', 'Log', 'Filestream', 'NotSupported', 'Fulltext'

sizeMB.Description: Size of the file in megabytes

loginType.Description: The type of login. Possible values include: 'WindowsUser', 'WindowsGroup', 'SqlLogin', 'Certificate', 'AsymmetricKey', 'ExternalUser', 'ExternalGroup'

defaultDatabase.Description: The default database for the login.

migrationEligibility.Description: Information about migration eligibility of a server object

isEligibleForMigration.Description: Whether object is eligible for migration or not.

validationMessages.Description: Information about eligibility failure for the server object.

isEnabled.Description: The state of the original AgentJob.

lastExecutedOn.Description: UTC Date and time when the AgentJob was last executed.

migrationEligibility.Description: Information about migration eligibility of a server object

input.Description: Input for the task that validates connection to Azure SQL Database Managed Instance.

output.Description: Task output. This is ignored if submitted.

taskType.Description: Properties for the task that validates connection to Azure SQL Database Managed Instance

targetConnectionInfo.Description: Information for connecting to SQL database server

Logins.Description: List of logins on the target server.

AgentJobs.Description: List of agent jobs on the target server.

input.Description: Input for the task that validates connection to SQL DB and target server requirements

output.Description: Task output. This is ignored if submitted.

taskType.Description: Properties for the task that validates connection to SQL DB and target server requirements

targetConnectionInfo.Description: Information for connecting to SQL database server

databases.Description: Source databases as a map from database name to database id

input.Description: Input for the task that collects user tables for the given list of databases

output.Description: Task output. This is ignored if submitted.

taskType.Description: Properties for the task that collects user tables for the given list of databases

connectionInfo.Description: Information for connecting to SQL database server

selectedDatabases.Description: List of database names to collect tables for

databasesToTables.Description: Mapping from database name to list of tables

hasRows.Description: Indicates whether table is empty or not

input.Description: Input for task that migrates SQL Server databases to Azure SQL Database Managed Instance.

output.Description: Task output. This is ignored if submitted.

taskType.Description: Properties for task that migrates SQL Server databases to Azure SQL Database Managed Instance

sourceConnectionInfo.Description: Information for connecting to SQL database server

targetConnectionInfo.Description: Information for connecting to SQL database server

backupFileShare.Description: File share information with Path, Username, and Password.

restoreDatabaseName.Description: Name of the database at destination

backupFileShare.Description: File share information with Path, Username, and Password.

userName.Description: User name credential to connect to the share location

password.Description: Password credential used to connect to the share location.

path.Description: The folder path for this share.

sasUri.Description: SAS URI of Azure Storage Account Container.

status.Description: Current status of migration. Possible values include: 'Default', 'Connecting', 'SourceAndTargetSelected', 'SelectLogins', 'Configured', 'Running', 'Error', 'Stopped', 'Completed', 'CompletedWithWarnings'

state.Description: Current state of migration. Possible values include: 'None', 'InProgress', 'Failed', 'Warning', 'Completed', 'Skipped', 'Stopped'

agentJobs.Description: Selected agent jobs as a map from name to id

logins.Description: Selected logins as a map from name to id

serverRoleResults.Description: Map of server role migration results.

orphanedUsers.Description: Map of users to database name of orphaned users.

databases.Description: Selected databases as a map from database name to database id

state.Description: Current state of migration. Possible values include: 'None', 'InProgress', 'Failed', 'Warning', 'Completed', 'Skipped', 'Stopped'

error.Description: Exception object for all custom exceptions

input.Description: Input for the task that migrates on-prem SQL Server databases to Azure SQL Database

output.Description: Task output. This is ignored if submitted.

taskType.Description: Properties for the task that migrates on-prem SQL Server databases to Azure SQL Database

sourceConnectionInfo.Description: Information for connecting to SQL database server

targetConnectionInfo.Description: Information for connecting to SQL database server

validationOptions.Description: Types of validations to run after the migration

targetDatabaseName.Description: Name of target database. Note: Target database will be truncated before starting migration.

makeSourceDbReadOnly.Description: Whether to set database read only before migration

tableMap.Description: Mapping of source to target tables

enableSchemaValidation.Description: Allows to compare the schema information between source and target.

enableDataIntegrityValidation.Description: Allows to perform a checksum based data integrity validation between source and target for the selected database / tables .

enableQueryAnalysisValidation.Description: Allows to perform a quick and intelligent query analysis by retrieving queries from the source database and executes them in the target. The result will have execution statistics for executions in source and target databases for the extracted queries.

state.Description: Current state of migration. Possible values include: 'None', 'InProgress', 'Failed', 'Warning', 'Completed', 'Skipped', 'Stopped'

errorPrefix.Description: Wildcard string prefix to use for querying all errors of the item

resultPrefix.Description: Wildcard string prefix to use for querying all sub-tem results of the item

input.Description: Input for task that validates migration input for SQL to Azure SQL Managed Instance

output.Description: Task output. This is ignored if submitted.

taskType.Description: Properties for task that validates migration input for SQL to Azure SQL Database Managed Instance

targetConnectionInfo.Description: Information for connecting to SQL database server

backupFileShare.Description: File share information with Path, Username, and Password.

backupFolderErrors.Description: Errors associated with the BackupFolder path

backupShareCredentialsErrors.Description: Errors associated with backup share user name and password credentials

backupStorageAccountErrors.Description: Errors associated with the storage account provided.

sourcePlatform.Description: Source platform for the project. Possible values include: 'SQL', 'Unknown'

targetPlatform.Description: Target platform for the project. Possible values include: 'SQLDB', 'SQLMI', 'Unknown'

creationTime.Description: UTC Date and time when project was created

sourceConnectionInfo.Description: Defines the connection properties of a server

targetConnectionInfo.Description: Defines the connection properties of a server

provisioningState.Description: The project's provisioning state. Possible values include: 'Deleting', 'Succeeded'
